entry.name: Diffuse Global Illumination
entry.description: This code sample shows a method of rendering dynamic scenes with diffuse intereflections in real time. The code is an implementation of the method introduced by Kaplanyan. For more information please refer to: Cascaded light propagation volumes for real-time indirect illumination [Kaplanyan and Dachsbacher 2010]
entry.keywords: Lighting, Global Illumination, Reflective Shadow Maps
